H3.text: when did president theodore roosevelt take office. 9/14/1901

A4.text: Roosevelt's tenure as the 26th president of the United States began on September 14, 1901, and expired on March 4, 1909.

A5.text: Roosevelt was sworn into office on the day of McKinley's death at the Ansley Wilcox House in Buffalo.
